---
title: "Getting Started"
---

Learn how to install the app and set up your ArcGIS account for field data collection.

## Installation

### Mobile App Installation

1. **iOS Devices**: Download from the App Store
2. **Android Devices**: Download from Google Play Store
3. **Windows Devices**: Download from Microsoft Store

### System Requirements

- iOS 13.0 or later
- Android 7.0 (API level 24) or later
- Windows 10 version 17763.0 or later

## Account Setup

### Creating an ArcGIS Account

1. Visit [ArcGIS Online](https://www.arcgis.com)
2. Click "Sign Up for a Free Public Account"
3. Fill in your details and verify your email
4. Complete your profile setup

### Organizational Accounts

If you're part of an organization:

1. Contact your GIS administrator
2. Request access to Field Maps
3. Obtain your organization's URL
4. Use your organizational credentials to sign in

## First Login

1. Open the Field Maps app
2. Enter your ArcGIS credentials
3. Allow location permissions
4. Complete the initial setup wizard
